query: SELECT si.*, gi.name, gi.imageUrl FROM studentItems si LEFT JOIN gachaItems gi ON si.itemId = gi.id WHERE si.studentId = 1 AND si.isEquipped = 1
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2CEWC7GGoWezLtD.root --database ZVkt36csMB4sQeeKBXWHBG --execute SELECT si.*, gi.name, gi.imageUrl FROM studentItems si LEFT JOIN gachaItems gi ON si.itemId = gi.id WHERE si.studentId = 1 AND si.isEquipped = 1
